trans-unit.source: Provides methods for identifying the components of a component.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder metoder for å identifisere komponentene til en komponent.

trans-unit.source: This interface provides methods that can be used to identify components of a component that are inherited from a base class.
trans-unit.target: Dette grensesnittet inneholder metoder som kan brukes til å identifisere komponentene i en komponent som er arvet fra en basisklasse.

trans-unit.source: To determine what components are inherited, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A> method and pass the component to search and an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> to store references to the identified components.
trans-unit.target: For å fastslå hvilke komponenter arves, kan du kalle den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A>metoden og pass komponenten til å søke og en <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>til å lagre referanser til identifiserte komponentene.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.GetInheritanceAttribute%2A> method to retrieve an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> for a component that has been identified by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Kall av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.GetInheritanceAttribute%2A>metode for å hente en <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>for en komponent som er identifisert av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.GetInheritanceAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: Searches the specified component for fields that implement the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> interface and adds each to the specified container, storing the inheritance level of each which can be retrieved using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.GetInheritanceAttribute*> method.
trans-unit.target: Søker i den angitte komponenten for felt som implementerer den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> grensesnittet og legger til den angitte beholderen, lagrer arv krypteringsnivået hver som kan hentes ved å bruke den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.GetInheritanceAttribute*>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.GetInheritanceAttribute*>

trans-unit.source: This method searches the specified component for any fields that implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>, adds each to the specified container, and stores an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> for each.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden søker den angitte komponenten for alle feltene som implementerer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>, legger til den angitte beholderen og lagrer en <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>for hver.</xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> for a component indicates whether the field is inherited from a base class and can be retrieved using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.GetInheritanceAttribute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>for en komponent som angir om feltet er arvet fra en basisklasse og kan derfor hentes ved hjelp av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.GetInheritanceAttribute%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.GetInheritanceAttribute%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>
Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref> å legge til komponenter i.

trans-unit.source: Gets the inheritance attribute for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Henter attributtet arv for den angitte komponenten.

trans-unit.source: If the component has been profiled by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A> method, this method returns the value <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute.NotInherited?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis komponenten er profilert av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A>metoden, denne metoden returnerer verdien for <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute.NotInherited?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute.NotInherited?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it returns the inheritance attribute for this component.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, returneres arv-attributtet for denne komponenten.

trans-unit.source: You should call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A> on the specified component or a parent of the specified component before attempting to obtain an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> that reflects the inheritance level of the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Du må kalle <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A>på den angitte komponenten eller overordnet i forhold til den angitte komponenten før du prøver å hente en <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>som gjenspeiler arv-nivået for den angitte komponenten.</xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> for which to retrieve the inheritance attribute.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> som du vil hente attributtet arv.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref> that describes the level of inheritance of the specified component.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"> </xref> som beskriver nivået for arvingen for den angitte komponenten.
